name: Computer Software IT Training Center online
overview:
SVR Technologies is one of the pioneers in computer training online. We delivered the training for many individual/ groups/ corporate. We prioritized to give our best quality of training and further assistance. You have complete freedom to customize course topics and time. Online training is a good experience and a generation ahead. No matter where ever you are living, just have a system with internet connection is enough to attend the classes. Register yourself for unbelievable price.

Our training catalog

XII. TIBCO Business works, Business Events, iProcess, Administration
